titleStmt.title: Theriaca Andromachi senioris diuinum inuentum The abouesaid antidote is composed in Venice vvith all diligence and careby Anthony Raffaeli apothecary at the signe of the Paradice at Riu'alta vpon the vvine banck in the presence and beforethe most illustrious magistrates of the old iustice, and the most excellent colledge of doctors and of the apothecaryes, and other deputys for the same, the faculties, and rare virtues of vvhich are as follo vveth for the good of all people.
titleStmt.author: Raffaeli, Francesco.

titleStmt.title: Theriaca Andromachi senioris diuinum inuentum The abouesaid antidote is composed in Venice vvith all diligence and careby Anthony Raffaeli apothecary at the signe of the Paradice at Riu'alta vpon the vvine banck in the presence and beforethe most illustrious magistrates of the old iustice, and the most excellent colledge of doctors and of the apothecaryes, and other deputys for the same, the faculties, and rare virtues of vvhich are as follo vveth for the good of all people.
titleStmt.author: Raffaeli, Francesco.

publicationStmt.publisher: M.DC.XCVII. Presso Domenico Milocho. Con licenza de' superiori,

notesStmt.note: First published in 1688, with "Francis" in place of "Anthony" in title.
Italian and English in parallel columns.
The spacing between and within words is irregular.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
